comments.text:
@Andrew Caputo
"Ruin it"? I'm sorry but that deserves a big fat FUCK YOU

Furry artwork is some of the best out there, and they are some of the best 
artists out there because art is such a big part of a furry's life.

Nobody ever "ruined anything", tyvm; just because YOU don't like something 
doesn't mean millions of other people around the world don't enjoy it. And 
it CERTAINLY doesn't give you the right to claim "americans" ruined 
anything. Btw, furries aren't an america-exclusive thing; the whole world 
has furries.

Grow up and learn to accept us, because we sure as hell aren't going 
anywhere.

comments.text:
+Andrew The Hedgehog lol i know that quite well.  I am simply saying there 
is no reason for people to get so insulted when someone calls avatar an 
anime given how closely it resembles a Japanese anime.  Most non anime fans 
dont know the differences.  It seems as if people take it as an insult as 
if comparing something western to their godlands animation is a heinous 
crime against humanity. I'm a pretty hardcore anime fan and i dont see why 
other people get so bloody frustrated
comments.author: AzTheSpaz ThePirateMod
